1.title: Dashboard
1.text1: You are currently on your main dashboard page.
1.text2: On this page you can find all the widgets you already added. You can also reorganize them using drag and drop.
1.text3: You can add new widgets from the 'widget store'. To access to the widget store, open the '+' menu in the sidebar and click on 'Add a new widget'.

2.title: Widget Store
2.text1: You can add as many widgets as needed by clicking on the + button on each widget.
2.text2: Once done, you can go back to your dashboard by clicking on the 'Back' button on the left.

3.title: Dashboard creation
3.text1: You can create as many dashboards as needed. To create a new dashboard, open the '+' menu in the sidebar and click on 'Create a new dashboard'.

4.title: Completed
4.text1: The tour is now complete! You can now close this window and use the dashboard application.

welcome.title: Welcome to the dashboard application
welcome.text1: It seems that this is your first time here. In order to discover the application, you can follow a short guided tour.
welcome.text2: Do you want to launch the tour?
